duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide consultative guidance for the architecture and design of privacy controls across the organization and product lines.
Guide engineering teams to ensure transparent data collection and usage practices that protect user privacy and mitigate risk.
Implement privacy capabilities, patterns, and policies into products and provide technical consulting on privacy for product teams.
Utilize 3rd party commercial tooling for privacy reviews and tracking issues.
Analyze and audit data through its lifecycle to ensure privacy requirements are met.
Build relationships with technical and compliance teams to deliver privacy-by-design controls for engineering deployments.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a similar technical field or equivalent practical experience (Master's degree preferred)
Certifications related to privacy, such as CIPP, CIPT, or CIPM
